    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      ProjectManager view constructor
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location -
      resources -

    • readProjects

      public void readProjects()
      Clears the projectCardContainer. Read the projects from the db. Insert the projects on projectCardContainer. If projectCardContainer have 5 childrens then addProjectButton is disabled

    • countChildrens

      private int countChildrens()
      Counts the number of childrens that projectCardContainer have
      Returns:
      Int number of children

    • addProjectCard

      private void addProjectCard​(Project project)
      Combines a Project and a ProjectCard and set the result in the projectCardContainer
      Parameters:
      project -

    • onAddProject

      void onAddProject​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Set dialogProject Visible and set the boolean dialogCreating to true
      Parameters:
      event -

    • showModifyDialog

      public void showModifyDialog​(Project project)
      Set dialogCreating boolean to false. Set the project received from parameter to the projectToModify ObjectProperty. Inserts the values from the received project inside the projectDialog formulary.
      Parameters:
      project - Project

    • onAcceptDialog

      private void onAcceptDialog​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Accept button on dialogProject.

      If the boolean dialogCreating is true a Project object is created from the formulary in the dialog and inserted into the db. If dialogCreating is false then the Project inside of projectToModify will be modified from the formulary in the dialog and updapted in the db.

      Parameters:
      event -

    • onCancelDialog

      private void onCancelDialog​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Cancel button on dialogProject.

      Reset the dialogProject and hide dialogProject and dialogDelete

      Parameters:
      event -

    • resetDialogProject

      private void resetDialogProject()
      Reset the formulary inside projectDialog

    • showDeleteDialog

      public void showDeleteDialog​(Project project)
      Sets dialogDelete visible. Sets the project received from parameter to the projectToDelete ObjectProperty.
      Parameters:
      project - Project

    • onAcceptDeleteDialog

      private void onAcceptDeleteDialog​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Delete the project from projectToDelete ObjectProperty from the db. Reset. the projectCardContainer. Hide dialogDelete.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • onCancelDeleteDialog

      private void onCancelDeleteDialog​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Set the projectToDelete ObjectProperty to null. HideDialogDelete
      Parameters:
      event -

    • hideDialogs

      public void hideDialogs()
      Hide dialogDelete and dialogProject
